original_title: The Girl in the Cellar: 8 Years Underground
overview: In 1998, Natascha Kampusch was abducted in broad daylight at the age of ten and held hostage in a basement for 3096 days. When she escaped in 2006, she was met with mistrust. Explores her story and how conspiracy theories have impacted her life.
title: The Girl in the Cellar: 8 Years Underground
